name: Hello Darkness My Old Friend
description:
"However vast the darkness, we must supply our own light. " 

-- Stanley Kubrick

Once upon a time, there was a tiny, tiny, invisible creature who lay dormant in the darkness. In a world where no one aware, she was its own king. Thus she was able to be free from the slightest restraint. If she pleased, she could fly to every corner and crouch in any shadow where the sunlight reflected. 

Unlike the darkness, the light was a whole unknown world to her, full of crises. she never dared to step out from the shadows into the light, but to peek at the other side through the cleft between light and darkness.

What about you? Our poor little creature who is afraid of the darkness. This journey is about you, but not just about you. It is a journey about you and your fears finding and accepting each other.
